mapper.select: SELECT s.SOLVED_ID, s.IS_SOLVED, s.SOLVED_SCORE, p.KOREAN_CONTENT, p.VIET_CONTENT, p.AUDIO_URL, p.PROBLEM_ID FROM SOLVED s JOIN PROBLEM p ON p.PROBLEM_ID = s.PROBLEM_ID WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND s.SOLVED_DATE = CURDATE()
SELECT VIET_CONTENT FROM PROBLEM WHERE PROBLEM_ID != #{problemId} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4

SELECT COUNT(*) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SOLVED WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} AND SOLVED_DATE = CURDATE()) * 100 FROM SOLVED WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} AND SOLVED_DATE = CURDATE() AND IS_SOLVED != "UNSOLVED"
SELECT AVG(SOLVED_SCORE) FROM SOLVED WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} AND SOLVED_DATE = CURDATE() AND IS_SOLVED != "UNSOLVED"
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT MEMBER_ID) FROM SOLVED WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} AND SOLVED_DATE = CURDATE() AND IS_SOLVED != "UNSOLVED"
